metadata.Name: AraSpider
metadata.Description: AraSpider is a large-scale Arabic-to-SQL dataset designed to facilitate research in semantic parsing and question answering over databases in Arabic. It contains complex SQL queries and corresponding natural language questions.
Affiliations: Zewail City of Science and Technology
metadata.Abstract: Building semantic parsers for low-resource languages like Arabic is challenging due to the scarcity of labeled data. Existing Arabic-to-SQL datasets are either small in size or lack the complexity of real-world queries. In this paper, we introduce AraSpider, a large-scale Arabic-to-SQL dataset containing 8,639 question-SQL pairs. AraSpider covers a wide range of database schemas and SQL query types, making it a suitable benchmark for evaluating the performance of Arabic-to-SQL models. We also propose a baseline model based on a pre-trained Arabic language model and demonstrate its effectiveness on AraSpider. Our experiments show that AraSpider is a challenging dataset that requires advanced semantic parsing techniques to achieve high accuracy. We believe that AraSpider will contribute to the development of more robust and accurate Arabic-to-SQL systems.
